Instrument Drivers¶

Each instrument comes with specific methods. However, calling the instrument directly should call the most useful of these methods. For example, directly calling a dmm will return the readout of the dmm.

  • Rohde Schwarz instrument drivers
  • Agilent instrument drivers
  • Yokogawa instrument drivers
  • Standford Research instrument drivers
  • Lecroy instrument drivers
  • NI-DAQ instrument drivers

data Module

Next topic

Rohde Schwarz instrument drivers
